name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course guides students to develop their English conversation, reading, and critical thinking skills. Students will engage in presentations and discussions on various issues from Western young adult literature and American popular culture. They are also encouraged to critically examine these issues and relate them to their own lives.
schedule:
Week 1     Introduction (Tuesday)
Week 2     Film Discussion
Week 3     Film Discussion
Week 4     Chapters 1-3 & Episode 1
Week 5     Discussion Session (Tuesday)
Week 6     Chapters 4-6 & Episode 2
Week 7     Chapters 7-9 & Discussion Session
Week 8     Chapters 10-12 & Episode 3
Week 9     Chapters 13-15 & Discussion Session
Week 10    Chapters 16-18 & Episode 4
Week 11    Chapters 19-21 & Discussion Session
Week 12    Chapters 22-24 & Episode 5
Week 13    Chapters 25-27 & Discussion Session
Week 14    Chapters 28-30 & Episode 6
Week 15    Chapters 31-33 & Discussion Session
Week 16    Chapters 34-36 & Episode 7
Week 17    Chapters 37-38 & Discussion Session
Week 18    Final
scorePolicy:
Class Attendance: 10%
Class Participation: 30%
Group Oral Report: 30%
Final: 30%
